nodes.text: Star Wars Insider 87 is the 87th issue of Star Wars Insider, released in April 2006.

The cover of this particular issue is an homage to the famous cover of the comic Uncanny X-Men #141, "Days of Future Past." Wolverine and Kitty Pryde are standing in front of a poster with the photos of mutants who are being hunted, while Obi-Wan Kenobi is standing in front of a poster with Jedi portraits.
